```{r}
# Reading in my data
urchin <-read.table("Spurp_OASV2_LarvalLengths.csv",header = T,sep=",")
head(urchin)

# Running my one-way ANOVA function on my data
fitANOVA <- function(data=urchin){
  xVar = urchin[,3]
  yVar = urchin[,4]
  myAOVModel <- aov(yVar~xVar,data = data)
  myAOVOutput<-summary(myAOVModel)
  return(myAOVOutput)
}


fitANOVA(urchin)

# Running my ANOVA Plot function on my data
fitANOVA <- function(data=urchin){
  xVar = urchin[,3]
  yVar = urchin[,4]
  myAOVModel <- aov(yVar~xVar,data = data)
  myAOVOutput<-summary(myAOVModel)
  return(myAOVOutput)
}

# Using my larval urchin morphometric data
fitANOVA(urchin)


fitANOVAPlot <- function(data=urchin){
  xVar = urchin[,3]
  yVar = urchin[,4]
  myAOVPlot <- boxplot(yVar~xVar, data=data, col=c("red", "pink", "green", "lightgreen", "blue", "lightblue"), main = "ANOVA Plot Example of pH Treatment Impact \n on Larval Urchin Body Size", xlab = "pH treatment", ylab = "body size (micrometers)")
  return(myAOVPlot)
}

# Running function with default settings
fitANOVAPlot(urchin)
```
